EmailTemplate.name: Training 3 Exam attended
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Re-take Exam
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!spExams__User_Exam__c.spExams__First_Name__c},
We have reschedule the exam {!spExams__User_Exam__c.spExams__Exam__c} for you.
You have three 3 chances in total to clear the exam. Unfortunately all the chances are over.
You can reschedule your exam by contacting your BU admin when you are prepared and ready for Exam.
Regards, Industrial BU Admin
